scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run server
scripts.update: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.hard-update: rm package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules/ && cd frontend && rm package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules/ && cd .. && npm run update
scripts.check: echo 'Node Version:' && node -v && echo 'npm Version:' && npm -v
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ..
